name: Riot in the Dungeon
description:
Riot in the Dungeon is my first attempt to make a 3D prototype using Unity Engine. 

CONTROLS
Keyboard:
Arrows / WASD     = Movement
J                                      = Shoot

Joystick:
Left Stick                   = Movement
X (PS) / A (XBOX) = Shoot 

Is a 3D retrostyle shooter with tank controls where you play as a Wizard fighting monsters in a dungeon. There are 3 kinds of energy balls:

- Fire 
- Ice
- Darkness

Also there are 3 kinds of enemies. Each monster has its weakness and resistance:

- Troll: Weak to Fire. Strong to Darkness
- Ghost: Weak to Darkness. Strong to Ice
- Dragon: Weak to Ice (thanks Pokemon), Strong to Fire

Magic power is Limited, and the only way to refill MP and change of Magic Type is by picking up the power-ups that spawn on the battle field (Like Contra or Metal Slug).

Just a prototype. Kill 15 enemies and you win. 

I'd thank a lot your opinion, feel free to write a comment below . 

Have fun  !
